statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character';
SELECT * FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) as asset_count FROM game_assets GROUP BY asset_type;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, LENGTH(asset_data) AS data_length FROM game_assets WHERE LENGTH(asset_data) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('armor', 'consumable') ORDER BY asset_id ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Image';
SELECT * FROM asset_metadata WHERE asset_id = 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT asset_name, file_path FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Video' LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, file_path FROM assets WHERE id BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, file_path FROM assets WHERE id = 5;
SELECT asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'video' AND file_path LIKE '%.mp4';
SELECT a.asset_name, am.created_at FROM assets a JOIN asset_metadata am ON a.id = am.asset_id WHERE am.updated_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM assets;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM assets ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_size > 100 ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM images INNER JOIN assets ON images.asset_id = assets.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM audio_files WHERE audio_file_url LIKE '%.mp3%' ORDER BY audio_id ASC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_id IN (SELECT asset_id FROM images WHERE image_url LIKE '%.png');
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM assets ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT a.asset_name, i.image_url FROM assets a INNER JOIN images i ON a.asset_id = i.asset_id;
SELECT a.asset_name, af.audio_file_url FROM assets a LEFT JOIN audio_files af ON a.asset_id = af.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM game_images;
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM game_images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT audio_name, audio_path FROM game_audio ORDER BY audio_name DESC;
SELECT model_name FROM game_3d_models WHERE model_id = 2;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT * FROM game_images WHERE image_name = 'image1';
SELECT image_name, image_path FROM game_images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'audio';
SELECT * FROM game_3d_models WHERE model_name LIKE '%car%';
SELECT image_name FROM game_images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, name, size FROM Images;
SELECT name, duration FROM AudioFiles;
SELECT vertices, faces FROM Models;
SELECT id, asset_type, asset_id FROM GameAssets;
SELECT asset_id, related_asset_id, relationship_type FROM AssetRelations;
SELECT * FROM Images LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, size FROM Images WHERE size > 100;
SELECT * FROM Models WHERE vertices < 1000 ORDER BY faces DESC;
SELECT Images.name, Models.vertices FROM Images JOIN Models ON Images.id = Models.id WHERE Models.faces > 500;
SELECT * FROM AssetRelations WHERE relationship_type = 'dependency'
